channel.title: Spanish
channel.description: I want to learn spanish over the internet and I was wondering if anyone knew a good site to do that.

item.title: Spanish
item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

Hmm Over the internet isnt going to be as easy as learning it froma teacher and trust me thats hard enough, but I learned a years worth and now im learning french. Seriously though if you are in highschool or will be learn it in school.

oh and a fun word is bienvenidos (I think thats how its spelled)

well
au revoir
or
goodbye
